ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06

Class EditDatePickerFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • android.app.DialogFragment
        • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301W15T06.EditDatePickerFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.app.DatePickerDialog.OnDateSetListener, android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.content.DialogInterface.OnCancelListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnDismissListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class EditDatePickerFragment
extends android.app.DialogFragment
implements android.app.DatePickerDialog.OnDateSetListener
    The EditDatePickerFragment class is an sub-class of DialogFragment. This class can set up a new DatePickerDialog and set date with desired format. This class will be called when user need to enter a date.
    Version:
    04/07/2015
    Author:
    CMPUT301W15T06
    See Also:
    SimpleDateFormat, Calendar, Date, Locale, DatePickerDialog, Dialog, DialogFragment, TimePickerDialog, Bundle, DatePicker, Toast
